title: Selfie Pulla English Meaning Lyrics Kaththi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Selfie Pulla English Meaning
Movie: Kaththi
Singer(s): Vijay, Sunidhi Chauhan
Lyrics: karky
Music: Anirudh
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
terra terra terraa bite-ah
kadhal irukku
neeyum bit-u bit-u bit-ah
bite-u panna yerum kirukku (2)

Instagram-athula vaadi vazhalaam
namma vazhum nimishathellaam
suttu thallalaam.

Naanum neeyum serum podhu
thaaru maaruthaan
andha facebook-u pichikidum
like-u share-u thaan

let's take-a selfie pulla
gimme a ummah ummah
selfie pulla
gimme a ummah  (2)

let's take-a selfie pulla
selfie pulla
let's take-a selfie pulla
selfie pulla

Photoshop-u pannaalamaley
filter onnum pannaamale
un mugaththa paakkum podhe
nenjam alludhu.

dappakuththu paattum illa
dandanakka beat-um illa
unna paakkum podhu
rendu kaalum thulludhu.

Kuchchi ice-um illa
neevaavum illa
un per sonnaa naakkellaam
thiththikkudhu.

Ada thannikulla naan
mungum podhu
unna nenachaale engengo
paththikkudhu.

veralukku pasi eduthu
uyir thudikka- ulla
negam vachachi unna konjam
adhu kadikka.

udhadukku pasi eduthu
adam pidikka - nee
muththam onnu thaayen naanum
padam pidikka.

let's take-a selfie pulla
gimme a ummah ummah
selfie pulla
gimme a ummah ummah (2)

ummah ummah

Kalayila kadhal solli
madhiyaanam thaali katti
saayingaalum thaenilavu
ponaa variyaa ?

dhegathula chocolateu naan
vegaththula rockettu naan
nilavula tent adippom
are you ready ya ?

ada rockettu onnu
neeyum rentu pannu
andha jupiter-il moon-u
mattum aruvathi moonu (63)

Andha nilavunga ellaam
inga thaevayilla
un kan rendu podhaadhaa
vaadi pulla

let's take-a selfie pulla
gimme a ummah ummah
selfie pulla
gimme a ummah 		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
Terra Bite of love
is in me.
if you bite n add bit by bit
I’ll go mad.

lets live in instagram
lets shoot n snap
every moment of our life.

Its an outstanding occasion
while we get together.
lets share in Facebook
to get unlimited likes n shares.

so lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss
lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss

lets take a selfie girl
lets take a selfie girl
lets take a selfie girl
lets take a selfie girl

without editing in photoshop
without applying any filters
your face is beautiful
and pulls my eyes

No folk song and
no beat song - but
when I see your face
my legs starts dancing

no ice cream
no sweet
but when I spell your name
my tongue tastes sweetness

though i dive
in water
while I think  you
i feel hot inside me.

my soul throbs on
hungriness of my finger.
but the nail bites you
inside me.

starving lips
is  so stubborn.
give me a kiss girl
let me take a snap.

lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss
lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss

a kiss ,a kiss

Propose in Morning
Marriage in Noon
Honeymoon in evening
is that fine ?

I’m a chocolate boy
I’m a rocket in speed
to tent at moon,
are you ready ?

Rent
one rocket.
there is 63 Moon’s
in Jupiter.

All those moon’s
are not needed.
come to me girl,
your eyes are just enough.

lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss
lets take a selfie girl
gimme a kiss
